text: Planeta Bur () is a 1961 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Pavel Klushantsev.Планеты бурь Александра Казанцева. Фантаст, который верил в человекаПланета бурь It stars Vladimir Yemelyanov, Georgiy Zhzhonov, and Gennadi Vernov. ==Actors== *Vladimir Yemelyanov as Ilya Vasilyevich Vershinin *Georgiy Zhzhonov as Roman Bobrov *Gennadi Vernov as Alyosha *Yuri Sarantsev as Ivan Shcherba *Georgi Teich as Allan Kern == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies
title: Planeta Bur
